title: Eloquent Chapter 2
message:
A fragment of code that produces a value is called an expression.

Since an expression is a fragement; a statement is a full sentence.  Statements are followed by a semicolon.

when a statement that changes a value (or performs an action is called a side affect.

Bindings
-Bindings are variables that hold information; 

-Bindings are defined and assigned by an operator and given an expression (expression is something that has to be evaluated).

-A name defined in a binding can be used as an expression (in the place of a number or calulation)
